column2: Alpha Black calling Papa Bear. We have cleared the refuel site and destroyed all equipment. Over.
Papa Bear, Alpha here. The farmers were apparently executed by the Reds. We found what looks like intel on a dead Red.
Alpha calling helo team Bravo. Requesting extraction at Haanslo Farm. Over.
Bravo to Alpha. We have the LZ in sight. Get ready for insert by fast roping. Bravo out.
This is Bravo. Copy that, Alpha. On our way. Out.
Bravo to Alpha, we're overhead. Get ready for extraction. Over.
Liftoff. Papa Bear, Alpha, this is Bravo. The eagle has soared. Going home. Out.
Papa Bear here. Nice Work, Alpha.
Understood, Alpha. Check for survivors and bring that intel back to us. Papa Bear out.
Papa Bear to Alpha team. Welcome back. Your mission is complete. Out.
